label: Gifts and Hampers
description: Market category for gifts and hampers for various occasions.
intents: Find a gift for a friend or family member
Order a hamper for a special occasion

subcategories.description: Hampers containing personal care and beauty products.

subcategories.label: Baby and New Parent Gifts
subcategories.description: Gifts and hampers for new parents and babies.

subcategories.description: Gifts and hampers for holidays and special occasions.
